name: Kayky Matos
summary: I started out studying web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, while also studying Python and SQL. I am currently pursuing my Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering and Professional Certifications at IBM. I recently completed my Specializations in Responsible Generative AI at the University of Michigan; Generative AI for Software Developers at IBM; Generative AI at Google Cloud; and DevOps, Cloud, and Agile Foundations at IBM. Continuous learning is crucial as the technology landscape evolves rapidly, so mastering skills and knowledge is essential for effective application in my career!
about: I am a passionate Software Engineering student with a deep interest in artificial intelligence and cloud computing. My journey started with web development and has evolved into a broader interest in AI technologies and their applications. I have pursued certifications from leading institutions like IBM, Google, and the University of Michigan, focusing on generative AI, DevOps, and Agile methodologies. My aim is to leverage these skills to innovate and contribute to cutting-edge projects in the tech industry. I recently authored an article on Artificial Intelligence and Quantum Computing, explaining the technologies and their fusion, you can check out on https://idcn-ai.network/the-integration-of-ai-directories-in-modern-technology/. I've developed in co-participation and taught a complete seminar about computer science, which in the end was heard by more than 600 people who attended the event. I have experience with development, operationalization and implementation of academic projects in and around computer sciences with the enhancement of resources and inputs; Project planning and monitoring academic projects; Creation and development of various seminars, conferences, events and stands based on Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence and New Technologies. At this point, I've gained experience in freelance designing and graphically implementing banners, flyers and logos for food and educational companies.
skills: Top skills - Software Development | Artificial Intelligence (AI) | Large Language Models (LLM) | React Native | Django | Python (Programming Language) | JavaScript | DevOps
Suggest solutions for possible inefficiencies in processes
Proactive and adaptable in teamwork; Excellent communication skills and ability to work in a team environment; Working on individual and team projects
Network with other teams; Experience in team meetings and events (Google Meet, Zoom, Teams, etc.)
